unnormalised: Weather's messing with our crops again, eh? Remember last year, 2022, near Aurangabad? Total disaster. My kisan friend, Ramesh, lost half his bajra crop. Heard IIT-Bombay is working on some climate-resilient seeds. Hope they crack it before the 2024 monsoons! My nani always says Indra Deva has a wicked sense of humour, especially around Diwali. 26/01/1950 we had hailstones! Maybe some advanced forecasting by IMD will help us plan better next time.
normalised: Weather's messing with our crops again, eh? Remember last year, two thousand and twenty two, near Aurangabad? Total disaster. My kisan friend, Ramesh, lost half his bajra crop. Heard I I T-Bombay is working on some climate-resilient seeds. Hope they crack it before the two thousand and twenty four monsoons! My nani always says Indra Deva has a wicked sense of humour, especially around Diwali. twenty sixth january nineteen fifty we had hailstones! Maybe some advanced forecasting by I M D will help us plan better next time.
